:::Sideswipe/Ratchet/Torca:::

::Sideswipe destroys one of the missles but gets hit by the other.  Mech 
fluid was pouring out of damages external and internal.  He fired 2 missles 
and 25 shots in various directions he beleived Double Punch to be in::
~~~~~
::Ratchet was hit by 2 ion disks. he was now bleeding more steadily. He fired 
15 shots from each gun and 2 tusk missles at Manterror::
~~~~~
::Torca was hit by 15 optic blasts and 2 stinger missles.  He fired 13 nails 
at Injector and 12 at Bumblebee::

--part1_8d.32ef99.2774d4e3_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
